parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, stall, or go into limp mode, which can lead to accidents, strand the driver, or cause significant inconvenience.
symptoms: The transmission slips or hesitates
the transmission fails to engage or disengage
the vehicle loses power
the vehicle stalls
the vehicle goes into limp mode
unusual noises or vibrations from the transmission.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag to deploy in a crash can result in serious injuries or fatalities to the occupants.
symptoms: Airbag did not deploy in a crash
despite the severity of the impact.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended deployment of an airbag can cause injuries to the occupants, distract the driver, and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: Airbag deployed suddenly without a crash
explosive deployment sprayed hard plastic shards throughout the passenger compartment
no apparent damage to the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A defective side impact sensor can cause the airbag to deploy unnecessarily or fail to deploy in a crash, leading to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Airbag deployed due to a small projectile striking the bottom of the vehicle
sensor interpreted an upward motion as a side-to-side motion
sensor is susceptible to damage due to its design and location.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose lower ball joints can cause the vehicle's front suspension to fail, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle's front suspension may feel unstable or loose
the vehicle may pull to one side while driving
the vehicle may vibrate or shake while driving
the ball joints may make noise or produce excessive play.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wipers to operate properly can cause reduced visibility, especially in adverse weather conditions, leading to accidents or near-miss situations.
symptoms: Windshield wipers fail to operate
wipers work less than 50% of the time
wipers stop operating for no apparent reason
wipers malfunction in snowy or rainy conditions
leaving the driver visually impaired.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cruise control system can cause the vehicle to accelerate unexpectedly on downhills, potentially leading to loss of control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle speeds up on downhills
the cruise control fails to maintain a set speed
the vehicle accelerates unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inability to read the odometer display can make it difficult for drivers to track their vehicle's mileage, potentially leading to missed maintenance intervals, which can affect vehicle performance and safety.
symptoms: The odometer display is invisible or difficult to read
especially during sunlit days.
